name: Mathematics - Hidden Object Mystery
description:
The mathematical world is suffering from a terrible, unknown phenomena that has long been plaguing its people. The residents are getting weary and tired waiting for help. And so Pifagor the great mathematician embarked on a journey to seek for your help!

Help Pifagor solve the mystery that has been plaguing his hometown! Solve math equations, find geometric shapes and missing numbers in this thrilling hidden object adventure! Explore stunning scenes as you uncover the mystery that lies ahead.

Save the future of the mathematical world and unravel the Mystery of Mathematics!

FEATURES:
-Look for Shapes, Numbers and Hidden Objects!
-Engaging storyline and mysterious plot!
-Hundreds of items to find!
-Hints available if you get stuck!
-Includes various bonus minigames!
